NBA players awards

Gets NBA awards for specified players

get_players_awards(players = NULL, player_ids = NULL, nest_data = F,
  return_message = TRUE)

Arguments

players

vector of players
player_ids

vector of player ids
nest_data

if TRUE returns nested data_frame
return_message

if TRUE returns a message

Value

a data_frame

See also

Other player: get_bref_players_bios, get_players_career_stats, get_players_tables_data, get_years_draft_combines

Other awards: get_bref_all_nba_teams

Examples

# NOT RUN {
get_players_awards(players = c( "Charles Oakley", "Gary Melchionni"),
player_ids = c(893, 76375),
return_message = T,
 nest_data = F)
# }

  • Arguments
  • Value
